code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Dashboard(){const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[body,setBody]=useState("");const[editing,setEditing]=useState(null);const loadNotes=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/notes");setNotes(res.data);};const handleAddOrUpdate=async()=>{if(editing!==null){await axios.put(`http://localhost:5000/notes/${editing}`,{title,body});setEditing(null);}else{await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/notes",{title,body});}setTitle("");setBody("");loadNotes();};const handleEdit=note=>{setTitle(note.title);setBody(note.body);setEditing(note.id);};const handleDelete=async id=>{await axios.delete(`http://localhost:5000/notes/${id}`);loadNotes();};useEffect(()=>{loadNotes();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control mb-2",placeholder:"Note Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"form-control mb-2",placeholder:"Note Body",value:body,onChange:e=>setBody(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success mb-4",onClick:handleAddOrUpdate,children:editing?"Update Note":"Add Note"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list-group",children:notes.map(note=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list-group-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:note.body}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-sm btn-warning me-2",onClick:()=>handleEdit(note),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-sm btn-danger",onClick:()=>handleDelete(note.id),children:"Delete"})]},note.id))})]});}
